original_text: He died as a sacrifice on behalf of all people, to pay the debt of their sins. He died at the proper time for God to show his purpose clearly.
korean_text: 그가 모든 사람을 위하여 자기를 대속물로 주셨으니 기약이 이르러 주신 증거니라

sentences.original_text: to pay the debt of their sins
He died at the proper time
for God to show his purpose clearly
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그의 목적을 명확히 보이시기 위해
